description: This file is a server entry point for a Remix application, handling HTTP requests and responses. It manages server-side rendering, request method handling, and streaming response setup, specifically for server-side rendering with React.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main handler for incoming HTTP requests; manages CORS headers, method checks, and dispatches to bot or browser handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering response when the requester is identified as a bot, streaming rendered HTML.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering response for browser clients, streaming rendered HTML.
